import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import FormData from "form-data"; import TimelineRight from "./timeline_right"; import UploadPost from "./timeline_right/UploadPost"; function Timeline() { const [data, setData] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { const id = localStorage.getItem("id"); axios .post("http://localhost:3002/upload/getpost", { _id: id }) .then((response) => { setData(response.data); }); axios .post("http://localhost:3002/auth", { _id: id }) .then((response) => { setData(response.data); }); }, []); return (
